mapper.select: select * from accom_book where user_id=#{user_id} and payment_condition='결제취소' order by accom_book_number desc
select nvl(point_useamount,0) from accom_book where accom_book_number=#{accom_book_number}
mapper.update: update user_info set user_point=user_point+#{user_point} where user_id=#{user_id}

update accom_book set accom_enddate=null,payment_condition='결제취소',total_price= case when accom_startdate=sysdate then total_price when accom_startdate<=sysdate+1 then trunc(total_price*0.7,0) when accom_startdate<=sysdate+2 then trunc(total_price*0.5,0) when accom_startdate<=sysdate+3 then trunc(total_price*0.3,0) when accom_startdate<=sysdate+4 then trunc(total_price*0.2,0) when accom_startdate<=sysdate+5 then trunc(total_price*0.1,0) else 0 end ,accom_startdate=null,point_useamount=0 where accom_book_number=#{accom_book_number}
mapper.select: select * from tour_book where user_id=#{user_id} and payment_condition='결제취소' order by tour_book_number desc
select nvl(point_useamount,0) from tour_book where tour_book_number=#{tour_book_number}
mapper.update: update tour_book set payment_condition='결제취소',total_price= case when tour_enddate is null and tour_startdate+7<=sysdate then 0 when tour_enddate is null and tour_startdate+7>sysdate then trunc(total_price*0.9,0) when tour_enddate is not null and tour_startdate+7<=sysdate then 0 when tour_enddate is not null and tour_enddate>sysdate+7 then trunc(total_price*0.9,0) when tour_enddate is not null and tour_enddate<=sysdate+7 then total_price end ,tour_startdate=null,tour_enddate=null,point_useamount=0 where tour_book_number=#{tour_book_number}
